messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: "Pack all this shit up, I want the chairs stacked, wreaths boxed, and the coffin in the back of that van by 2pm. Be sure to lift with your knees, not your backs."

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: You're darn right I abuse drugs. I see a drug, I punch the crap out of it. Get lost, drugs.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Lotta traitors, Should we call or not?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Confirmed outbreak of level 7 viral biohazard aboard Space Station 13. All personnel must contain the outbreak.

messages.author: Bumps (Chief Engineer)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">RD is slacking from his work. What a gay to be off doing something else when your soul and body is owned by nanotrasen. Get to work you lazy fuck</font>
